objects.name: Task requirements
objects.description:
This object is deprecated as its content has been merged into the enterprise domain. Please see the [PRE](http://attack.mitre.org/matrices/enterprise/pre/) matrix for its replacement. The prior content of this page has been preserved [here](https://attack.mitre.org/versions/v7/techniques/T1240).

Once divided into the most granular parts, analysts work with collection managers to task the collection management system with requirements and sub-requirements. (Citation: Heffter) (Citation: JP2-01)

external_references.description: Clyde R. Heffter. (2011, August 4). A Fresh Look at Collection Requirements. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
Joint Chiefs of Staff. (2012, January 05). Joint and National Intelligence Support to Military Operations. Retrieved March 2, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Normally, defender is unable to detect.  Few agencies and commercial organizations may have unique insights.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Normal aspect of adversary planning lifecycle.  May not be done by all adversaries.
